column4: hey, I just installed the latest Gaimn version with Synaptic Package Manager, but everytime I start Gaim, its still the older version.  What do I need to do
anyone?
I just installed the latest Gaimn version with Synaptic Package Manager, but everytime I start Gaim, its still the older version.  What do I need to do
becuase I go to the About menu, and it says 1.2.1
ok
k
yes
no, wait
one sec
Package versions are not necissarly program versions. Updates may contain the same version, but packaged a little better
killall esd
You tried running "killall esd" before loading Audacity?
i did.  that got rid of the error, but, It still wont record
Sorry, my microphone is crappy so I have never bothered trying
rm -r
rmdir will remove an empty directory, rm -r will go through the directory removing everything in it, then the directory itself
just double click it (you will find it in ~/.wine)
~/.wine/drive_c/Program Files
Wire = Different IP address? Wireless = Different network name/key?
I am guessing that the machine you are connecting to is Windows?
If it is a Linux machine then make sure you set up your gateway as the Internet connected machine, and set up IP Masquerading on that machine (Firestarter can do this for you)
im not trying to connect to another machine.  Just the router
OK, if it uses DHCP then it should be pretty simple
